author: barnabasbusa
content:
On the last eof call the consensus was to try to roll out eof devnet on top of pectra. 

Could EL client teams please confirm which branches we should be using to test EOF-devnet-0? 
What would be the way to activate EOF on geth/besu/nethermind?

author: draganrakita
content: Basu and reth and closest to having functional devnet. For other teams this is still wip.

author: barnabasbusa
content: reth uses the geth style genesis.json for initalizing a network. What value do you use to trigger EOF ?

author: draganrakita
content: It is currently set for Prague, but in next days would introduce PragueEOF to saparate it from devnet-1

author: barnabasbusa
content: ok

author: barnabasbusa
content:
something like this then? 
```
... 
"shanghaiTime": 0,
"cancunTime": 0,
"pragueTime": (infinity),
"pragueEOFTime": <configured>
...
```

author: draganrakita
content: In Reth, Enabling PragueEOF will enable Prague and all other EIPs. Linking discussion for making EOF use EIPs on top of devnet-1: https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/892088344438255616/1250412102288408577

author: parithosh
content: While we have you here, also respond to the prague discussion as well: https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/892088344438255616/1252277408044683294

author: barnabasbusa
content: so if we wanna enable `pragueEOFTime` then it must match `pragueTime` ?

author: barnabasbusa
content: <@360491619402776577> could you add support to the same flag name in geth then ?

author: barnabasbusa
content: <@814151075601973278> could you please add support to the same flag in erigon?

author: _shemnon
content: Besu doesn't have to have the "PragueTime" entry if the "PragueEOFTime" entry exists.  The presence of the "PragueEOFTime" entry implies that all prior forks not enumerated are enabled at that time, and Prague is prior to PragueEOF.

author: barnabasbusa
content: I would like to keep is as uniform as possible, so will most likely use the same format for besu / geth genesis

author: barnabasbusa
content: btw when will besu be able ot read geth style genesis.json? ðŸ˜„

author: _shemnon
content: There are differences with Geth style genesis.  We are close, but we haven't taken it as a requirement to read Geth's genesis.

author: barnabasbusa
content: its not a requirement, it would be a nice to have going forward

author: matt.nelson
content: Noted

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: I just realized that we need to upstream a bunch of pectra stuff first, will try to get that done within the next week or so and then provide a version with `pragueEOFTime`
